thread.title: Manchester United vs FC Rostov preview: What Jose Mourinho has said and the key stats from first game
thread.title_full: Manchester United vs FC Rostov preview: What Jose Mourinho has said and the key stats from first game

author: Jake Polden
title: Manchester United vs FC Rostov preview: What Jose Mourinho has said and the key stats from first game
text:
Get Chelsea FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Manchester United host FC Rostov for the second leg of their Europa League last-16 clash on Thursday night. 
In the above video, Red Devils boss Jose Mourinho gives his thoughts ahead of the game, and reveals what he expects from his side. 
Also in the clip are the stats from the first leg that suggest that Thursday night's game will be anything but easy for United. 
Henrikh Mkhitaryan put the Red Devils ahead in the first game at the Olymp-2 Stadium, despite the bumpy pitch. Jose Mourinho talks to the press ahead of the FC Rostov clash (Photo: PA) Manchester United fans arrive at Old Trafford for the second leg (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) Man United drew 1-1 with Rostov when the teams played in Russia (Photo: REUTERS) 
And Man United were in the driving seat at half time in Russia, looking to press on after the break and extend their advantage. 
But Rostov fought back in the second 45 to ensure they would still be in the tie for their historic return trip to Old Trafford. 
They equalised through Aleksandr Bukharov and recorded a respectable 1-1 draw, meaning there is everything to play for on Thursday. poll loading Will Manchester United beat FC Rostov? 2000+ VOTES SO FAR
